title: How to fix font/text of App labels
content:
I just purchased a Pixel 3 XL, and names of apps are all messed up. Very few fit under the app icon itself, and trail off with a .... I just moved from iOS and this is one thing that's driving me crazy. I cant read the label under most apps, and there is plenty of room for them. 

Thanks!
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
